select j.userid,j.orderdate,j.orderid,j.status,order_product.productid,productname,price,order_product.quantity,imagepath from ( select u.userid,orderid, orderdate,status from user as u INNER JOIN user_order as uo ON u.userId = uo.userId AND u.userId = #{userid} LIMIT 0,5 ) as j INNER JOIN order_product ON j.orderid = order_product.orderid INNER JOIN product ON product.productid = order_product.productid INNER JOIN product_image ON product_image.productid = order_product.productid ORDER BY j.orderid DESC;
